§lFeather Falling III:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two feathers (R) and a slime ball (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a row of lapis along the top (L).
§lLLL

§lFeather Falling IV:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two feathers (R) and a slime block (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a row of lapis along the top and on the left (L).
